summary: The implementation covers most core requirements including Internet Identity authentication, player database, team creation, contest system, wallet management, and UI theming. However, critical features like the points scoring system (REQ-6), leaderboard rankings (REQ-7), and Stripe payment integration (REQ-8) are either incomplete or missing from the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement points scoring system that calculates fantasy team scores based on player performance metrics (goals, assists, clean sheets, etc.)
missing_requirements.reason: No evidence of scoring logic, performance metrics tracking, or point calculation implementation. Backend lacks fields for goals, assists, clean sheets, or any scoring mechanisms.

missing_requirements.requirement: Build leaderboard display showing contest rankings with user teams sorted by total points
missing_requirements.reason: Leaderboard page exists (frontend/src/pages/Leaderboard.tsx) but is not shown in diff. Cannot verify if rankings, total points, current user highlighting, or sorting by scores are implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Integrate Stripe payment system for contest entry fee payments
missing_requirements.reason: Stripe configuration setup exists but no actual payment flow for contest entry fees. No checkout session creation for contest entries, payment confirmation logic, or failed payment handling specific to contests.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin-only player management (addPlayer function requires admin permission)
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not specify admin roles or admin-only features. It mentions player database creation but not administrative access controls for player management.

hallucinated_features.description: Payment success and failure dedicated pages with routing
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request separate pages for payment outcomes. While payment handling is required, specific success/failure page routes were not specified.
